description: At present, roughly half of Malaysia' GDP comes from the services sector. It is also the sector where households spend the most money, whether on food and drink, eduction, transportation, or health. Accordingly, policymakers pay close attention to its performance. Using data from our quarterly publication on services, this dashboard summarises key indicators and gives you an easy way to monitor Malaysia' services sector.

section_1.title: How are key services statistics trending?
